mapper.insert:
oracle
insert into T_BASEDATA (F_CODE, F_NAME, F_GROUP, F_ISGROUP, F_CREATE_BY, F_CREATE_DATE, F_UPDATE_BY, F_UPDATE_DATE, F_STATUS, F_VERSION, F_STEPID, F_WERKS, F_REMARK, F_ACTIVE) values (#{fCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fIsgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fCreateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fCreateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fUpdateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fStepid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fWerks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fActive,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update T_BASEDATA set F_CODE = #{fCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_NAME = #{fName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_GROUP = #{fGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_ISGROUP = #{fIsgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_CREATE_BY = #{fCreateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_CREATE_DATE = #{fCreateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_UPDATE_BY = #{fUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_UPDATE_DATE = #{fUpdateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_STATUS = #{fStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_VERSION = #{fVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, F_STEPID = #{fStepid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_WERKS = #{fWerks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_REMARK = #{fRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_ACTIVE = #{fActive,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where F_ID = #{fId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select F_ID, F_CODE, F_NAME, F_GROUP, F_ISGROUP, F_CREATE_BY, F_CREATE_DATE, F_UPDATE_BY, F_UPDATE_DATE, F_STATUS, F_VERSION, F_STEPID, F_WERKS, F_REMARK, F_ACTIVE from T_BASEDATA where F_ID = #{fId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
